message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,000. This is still a fair price for the value of the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $10,500 for the product.
